title: UAV Disaster Response System
decisions: Finalize the flight plan workflow and integration tasks.
Keep the spotlight module for the demo.
key_points: Autopilot tuning is 90% done with minor yaw oscillations.
Path-planning module is ready with new features.
Integration with thermal camera API is pending due to SDK instability.
Battery endurance is around 22 minutes with full payload.

action_items.task: Closed-loop flight test of grid search mode

summary:
The meeting focused on finalizing the flight plan workflow and
   integration tasks for the upcoming field demo. Key updates were provided on avionics, software, and hardware aspects, with action items assigned to ensure readiness for the demo.
